channel.title: What the hell?
channel.description:
I've looked up 39 pages of tutorials on this forum and never found a solution to my problem.
I need help on how to change what stats could be on a weapon/ring/cape.
What exactly do I have to do?

item.title: What the hell?
item.dc:creator: @SiXSiXSiX SiXSiXSiX
item.description:
@SiXSiXSiX wrote:

Okay, I think I got it.

item = 2583 Black_platebody_(t) Black_plate_body_with_trim. 2713.49594254521 2713.49594254521 3299.56345948838 1000.0 1000.0 10000.0 10000.0 10000.0 10000.0 10000.0 10000.0 10000.0 10000.0 10000.0 10000.0 10000.0 10000.0 10000.0.

Whenever I try to start my server now, crashes. Help?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2007, 02:53:54 PM[/size][hr]Anyone.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2007, 03:13:49 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?? I need help with this badly.

Read full topic

item.title: What the hell?
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

its like this

item = ####, #### - #### - ####, #-#-#-#-#, #-#-#-#-#, #, #

alright commas seperate groups, dashes seperate numbers
first one is the item id
second group are prices
edit the second one for overall prices
next 5 (group 3) are attack bonuses
next 5 (group 4) are defense bonuses
next 1 is strength bonuses
next 1 is prayer bonus

Read full topic

item.description:
@SiXSiXSiX wrote:

What I mean is…

Say I put on a ‘perfect’ ring. Expect of having +10 stats in everything, I want it to have +1000 stats in everything.
